alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:51PM EST until December 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Southern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
